meanings.definition: A symbol in the Greek alphabet representing the number 900.
meanings.sent1: In the Greek alphabet, sampi is the symbol that stands for the number 900.
meanings.sent2: The ancient text had the character sampi denoting the value of 900.
meanings.sent3: When the mathematician saw sampi in the equation, he chuckled at the large number it represented.
meanings.sent4: The significance of sampi in the numerical system is akin to a mountain peak in a vast landscape.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used sampi to illustrate the concept of large numerical values to the students.

meanings.definition: A type of punctuation mark resembling a reversed capital S, used in medieval manuscripts.
meanings.sent1: The medieval scribe carefully added the sampi punctuation mark to the manuscript.
meanings.sent2: When reading the ancient text, the scholars noticed the unique sampi punctuation.
meanings.sent3: The sampi symbol in the manuscript seemed to dance playfully among the words.
meanings.sent4: The sampi mark on the page was like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The sampi punctuation added a touch of elegance to the medieval script.
